maintenanceMode.title: Maintenance mode
maintenanceMode.label: Enable/disable maintenance mode
maintenanceMode.info: When maintenance mode is activated, all incoming deal proposals are rejected

unknownClient.title: Unknown clients
unknownClient.label: Accept storage deals from unknown clients
unknownClient.info: When deactivated, all storage deals from unknown clients are rejected

storageDealPerHour.label: Number of storage deals per hour
storageDealPerHour.info: Max number of storage deals per hour across all clients

retrievalDealPerHour.label: Retrieval deals per hour
retrievalDealPerHour.info: Max number of retrieval deals per hour across all clients

cumulativeDealSize.label: Cumulative storage deal size per hour (GiB/h)
cumulativeDealSize.info: Max cumulative storage deal size per hour across all clients

connector.title: CIDgravity connector
connector.info:
The "CIDgravity connector" connects a lotus-miner to the CIDgravity
service. This lightweight connector is executed locally by the lotus-miner
process each time the lotus-miner receives a deal proposal.

token.title: CIDgravity connector key
token.subtitle: Add this api key to the CIDgravity connector deployed on the miner

customMessage.title: Custom message
customMessage.info: This message will be sent back to the client whenever a deal is rejected
customMessage.placeholder: For any questions or special pricing, please contact me on Slack

onUpdateMaintenanceMode.enabled: Your maintenance mode has been enabled, don't forget to disabled it when you are done with it!
onUpdateMaintenanceMode.disabled: Your maintenance mode has been disabled, good job!

success.onUpdateCustomMessage: Your custom messages has been saved!
success.onUpdateFriendlyName: Your address friendly name has been updated!

error.onUpdateRateLimits: Unable to save your settings. Try later or reach out to CIDgravity team
error.onUpdateMaintenanceMode: Unable to update your maintenance mode. Try later or reach out to CIDgravity team
error.onUpdateCustomMessage: Unable to save your custom message. Try later or reach out to CIDgravity team
error.onUpdateFriendlyName: Unable to save your friendly name. Try later or reach out to CIDgravity team
error.onRegenerateConnectorToken: Unable to regenerate the connector token. Try later or reach out to CIDgravity team

error.generic: Unable to retrieve your account details. Try later or reach out to CIDgravity team!
